turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like a order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can place an order for you. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a vanilla bean?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want a vanilla bean frappuccino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want regular whole milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, whole milk it is. Which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 venti vanilla bean frappuccino from starbucks in chicago will be $6.50. Did you want me to submit the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, it'll be ready in 10 minutes. The receipt has been sent to your phone. Did you need anything else from me today?
